name: YourEyes
0:
”Alexa open your eyes”
”Alexa open your eyes and read this”
”Alexa open your eyes and read this in chinese”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: your eyes
des:
Yes, this skill gives eyes to Alexa. To start using this skill you first have to download an Alexa Companion app which is available for iPhone, iPad, Fire tablet, Android phones and tabs. Then click a picture using companion app and ask -
"Alexa open your eyes" OR
"Alexa open your eyes and read this" OR
"Alexa open your eyes and read this in chinese"
Supported languages are - arabic, chinese, czech, english, french, german, italian, japanese, portuguese, russian, spanish, turkish

***Remember to use the same Amazon account for skill linking and login into the app.***

Have fun :)

Search for "Alexa Companion" on Apple Store and Google Store
